Procedure.name: setupCCC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=SEC initialize=CCC receiversSetup=CCC servoSetup=SEC setServoElevationTracking=ON asOn device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff setAttenuation=0,15 setAttenuation=1,5 ifdist=1,1,44 ifdist=2,1,32

Procedure.name: setupMMC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=SEC initialize=MMC receiversSetup=MMC servoSetup=SEC setServoElevationTracking=ON asOn device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff setAttenuation=0,0 setAttenuation=1,4 ifdist=1,1,44 ifdist=2,1,32

Procedure.name: setupKKC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=SEC initialize=KKC receiversSetup=KKC servoSetup=SEC setServoElevationTracking=ON asOn device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff ifdist=1,1,44 ifdist=2,1,32

Procedure.name: setupQQC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=SEC initialize=QQC receiversSetup=QQC servoSetup=SEC setServoElevationTracking=ON asOn device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff ifdist=1,1,44 ifdist=2,1,32

Procedure.name: setupXXP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=PRIM initialize=XXP receiversSetup=XXP servoSetup=SXP setServoElevationTracking=OFF asOn device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff ifdist=1,3,44 ifdist=2,3,32

Procedure.name: setupXSP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=PRIM initialize=XXP receiversSetup=XXP servoSetup=SXP setServoElevationTracking=OFF asOff device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff ifdist=1,4,44 ifdist=2,3,32

Procedure.name: setupLLP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=LL initialize=LLP receiversSetup=LLP servoSetup=LLP setServoElevationTracking=OFF asOff device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff ifdist=1,2,44 ifdist=2,2,32

Procedure.name: setupSSP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=PRIM initialize=SSP receiversSetup=SSP asOff servoSetup=SXP setServoElevationTracking=OFF device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff ifdist=1,4,44 ifdist=2,4,32

Procedure.name: setupSXP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=PRIM initialize=SSP receiversSetup=SSP servoSetup=SXP setServoElevationTracking=OFF asOff device=0 calmux=TotalPower calOff ifdist=1,3,44 ifdist=2,5,32
